abstract: Whether you want to bulk up a salad or dine on a vegetable and rice bowl, adding a poached egg is a simple way to add indulgence to a light meal, writes Martha Rose Shulman in this week’s Recipes for Health.
snippet: Whether you want to bulk up a salad or dine on a vegetable and rice bowl, adding a poached egg is a simple way to add indulgence to a light meal, writes Martha Rose Shulman in this week’s Recipes for Health.

headline.main: Topping a Meal With a Poached Egg
